thread.title: 20 Smoothie Tips, Hints, and Recipes

author: Emily Han
title: 20 Smoothie Tips, Hints, and Recipes
text:
20 Smoothie Tips, Hints, and Recipes 20 Smoothie Tips, Hints, and Recipes Dairy-Free Raspberry Mango Mint Smoothie 
Smoothies are a fast, easy breakfast, and many of us are devoted to our morning shake of fruits, vegetables, and yogurt. If you would like a few tips to help build a better smoothie, look no further. We've rounded up our best ideas and tips covering everything from blenders to protein powder, plus inspiring recipes with fruit, greens, and even whole grains. There's a raspberry rosewater smoothie with yogurt and honey, and another with fresh coconut and kale. Plus â€” the fastest way to a morning smoothie!
